Package it.polimi.softeng.client.view.CLI

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.client.view.CommonOperationsFramework
it.polimi.softeng.client.view.CLI.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, Runnable
public class CLI extends CommonOperationsFramework implements UI, Runnable
Command Line Interface for MyShelfie

      typeOfCommand - 1 for generic command, 2 for chatCheck, 3 for gameCheck
      Returns:
      true if command follows regex standard
